reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The desk was easy to assemble with the included allen wrench. I did have to use a Philips head screwdriver for the motor control box. It took me ~1hr to assemble. I have had the desk for 1 day, so I can't speak to its quality, but it is sturdy and has a good amount of work space. The desktop came in 2 pieces, but I don't think it will interfere with the use of the desk. The motor operates flawlessly and the controls are easy to use. it seems that this desk is very good quality for the price. -Brendan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and easy to build.
reviews.reviewText: Honestly shocked by the great quality for the affordable price. I purchased the small 40" desk in maple. It was really easy to put together; I did it in 30 min or so by myself including unpacking and clean up. The lowering/raising mechanism works great. The packaging was protective and all parts were in great shape upon unpacking. All holes and parts lined up beautifully. It came with a larger than usual allen wrench for plenty of leverage which made building it very easy. Also came with cable management clips and a small plastic drawer that I wasn't expecting. Very pleased. If you're looking for an adjustable desk around this price point, I recommend this one for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Workspace with the SHW Memory Preset Electric Height Adjustable Standing Desk
reviews.reviewText: I added my home office setup with the SHW Memory Preset Electric Height Adjustable Standing Desk in the 48 x 24-inch size with a beautiful Walnut finish, and I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. Here's why this desk has made such a positive impact on my work life:1. Easy Height Adjustment: The electric height adjustment feature of this desk is a game-changer. With just the press of a button, I can effortlessly transition between sitting and standing positions. This not only helps me stay more active during the workday but also alleviates any discomfort associated with prolonged sitting.2. Memory Presets: The memory presets are a lifesaver. I can program my preferred sitting and standing heights, allowing me to switch between them with precision and ease. It's a real-time-saver and ensures I always have the perfect ergonomic setup.3. Solid Build: The desk feels incredibly sturdy and well-constructed. The Walnut finish adds a touch of elegance to my workspace, and the materials used are of high quality. I do not doubt that this desk will last for years to come.4. Spacious Work Surface: The 48 x 24-inch size is ideal for my needs. It provides ample space for my monitor, laptop, keyboard, and other work essentials without feeling cluttered. The smooth surface is easy to clean and maintain.5. Cable Management: The cable management system is a thoughtful addition. It keeps my cables organized and out of sight, contributing to a clean and organized workspace.6. Quiet Operation: The desk's motor operates quietly, so it doesn't disrupt my workflow or create any distractions during conference calls or meetings.7. Health Benefits: I've noticed a significant improvement in my overall comfort and energy levels since using this desk. The ability to stand and stretch throughout the day has positively impacted my productivity and well-being.8. Easy Assembly: Setting up the desk was straightforward, thanks to clear instructions and labeled parts. It didn't take long before I had my new workspace up and running.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely LOVE this desk!
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and sitting on my butt all day is not the way I want to spend my life. I got this to help me be up more than down for the day and I wanted to see if it could help me change my life.Setup:-Putting it together took a little bit of time. I did it myself with the easy to follow directions. It maybe took an hour and that's with me kinda moving a little slow (I was tired but excited).Pros:-I absolutely LOVE being able to stand when I work. I'm 5'2 so I wasn't worried about the height not being tall enough for me. I preset my sitting and standing number and it's so easy to flip between the two with ease and with speed.-My butt doesn't hurt from sitting all day. In fact, I stand more than I sit now which makes me feel healthier and makes my body feel better!-The desk shifting up and down is actually pretty quiet. It doesn't disturb my calls and moves quickly enough so that I'm not just sitting there waiting for it to get to the height I set it for.-The look of the desk top is very nice and aesthetically pleasing for me.-It's not bulky but it still fits my two monitors, my keyboard, mouse, my large water bottle, and anything else I need!Cons:-It feels a little wobbly sometimes. I retightened everything because I've been using this desk for quite a few months and figure some of that is just from using it CONSTANTLY. It is a little on the lighter side though so I wouldn't recommend putting a whole ton of weight on it.All in all, if you're looking for a standing desk that is quiet, easily transitions, looks nice, and can fit all your things for work or school, this is it! I LOOOVE mine and only took a star off due to the lack of sturdiness that I experience with it. It's not a bad lack of sturdiness. It just makes me a little weary to put my body weight on it so I don't lean on it or anything.

The instructions were clear. Assembly took 20 mins. Whole table is sturdy both when elevated or not. There are adjusters on both legs, which can be useful if your hardwood is wonky. The construction material is solid. I have been using it for a month now. The adjustment mechanism works fine. There are 4 modes which can be set acc to your preference. Right now I got two monitor screens, two studio monitors, MacBook stand and other i/o peripherals and they all sit well on the table and don’t wobble when moving up and down. The cable management is really easily. I would recommend, getting an extension cord and just attach every power cable to it, place the extension on the wire shelf, such that the only wire hanging to the wall outlet would be the extension cord’s cable, which can be hide by using a wire sleeve or vertebrae. Lastly , I ordered the rustic brown and it looks really good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bastante práctica y buena además de barata
reviews.reviewText: En general me encantó la mesa. Es muy fácil de armar, pude armarla yo sólo. Tiene todo lo que necesitas para armarla excepto un desarmador de cruz que necesitarás al final.La mesa funciona muy bien, sube y baja sin problemas y estoy muy emocionado de usarla.Desafortunadamente la tabla me llegó rota pero el daño es meramente estético.Otra cosa es que tardó poco menos de un mes en llegar,.así que si es algo que les urge deben tenerlo en cuenta.

Me gustó mucho el escritorio, es tal cual en la imagen, me gustó mucho la calidad, es pesado, así que cuando recibas, hazlo con ayuda. eso si, tarda mucho el envío a México (+3 meses), pero por el precio vale la pena la espera.
Llegó a tiempo y en perfectas condiciones, fácil de armar y funciona muy bien. Es justo lo que esperaba

reviews.reviewTitle: easy to assemble, looks good, works well
reviews.reviewText: decent product at a decent pricing
